name: Wiccan Roulette
description:
Weekly Gam Jam 141 : Good Luck

"The Wiccan Roulette", roll your dices and see if your skill can prevail over you luck... or maybe luck will be by your side this time ? Will you defeat the 5 luckiest people in the universe ?

Find my art on instagram : https://www.instagram.com/bentspoon_/
